sense.def:
Kar je
uppermost
, je višje od drugih delov nečesa ali najviše v skupini stvari.

seg.quote: He was pointing with the whole of his hand, thumb uppermost.
He gently examined the uppermost leaves.

sense.def:
Kar je
uppermost in a situation
, je najpomembnejše v danih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: There were two thoughts uppermost in my mind.
